data.author: Briana Bouchard
data.message:
Revisions to lidar example to allow for use of namespaces

- remapped topics to switch to relative from absolute in all launch files and config files
- added namespace argument in all launch files
- created new launch file for rviz that directly pulls in rviz config
- changed rviz frame rate config to 5 from 30 based on issues in testing
